I heard that LabVIEW will be discontinued for FRC, is there any more news about actuators, peripherals and sensors?

Thanks with all for the feedbacks!

Here’s the thread for the blog post about the new controller:

[FRC/FTC Blog] Introducing the Future Mobile Robot Controller! Control System

IIRC, no new peripherals or other products have been announced yet

I would expect to see more information come out about SystemCore at the Championship event when vendors usually start showing off prototypes, and then in the following months as teams begin alpha testing.

Probably not, as it still operates on the disallowed bands, they’d have to open up the 2.4/5ghz bands at comps, and they still chose not to do that this year with the radios on 6ghz
